ExternalDatabaseInfo.CreateViewSql: select `t_sales`.`billing_no` AS `請求番号`,`t_sales`.`billing_date` AS `請求日`,(case when (`m_customer`.`invoice_notice_id` is not null) then `m_customer`.`invoice_notice_id` else `t_sales`.`billing_comp_id` end) AS `通知先ID` from (`t_sales` join `m_customer` on((`m_customer`.`customer_id` = `t_sales`.`billing_comp_id`))) where (`t_sales`.`delete_flg` = 0) group by `t_sales`.`billing_date`,`t_sales`.`billing_no`,(case when (`m_customer`.`invoice_notice_id` is not null) then `m_customer`.`invoice_notice_id` else `t_sales`.`billing_comp_id` end)
